==Description==
This weakness occurs when the application transmits or stores authentication credentials and uses an insecure method that is susceptible to unauthorized interception and/or retrieval.
==Impact==
==Countermeasures==
Hash and salt passwords: * [[6e0918c1-90db-46d5-9f0e-8a98ddbcd7d5|Hash And Salt Passwords]] * [[5d3dc146-9274-430d-b357-7ee8ea0c082f|Hash And Salt Passwords for Storage]] * [[bcf8adb4-8186-4b97-b490-4fa33f506bfd|Limit Access to the Credential Store]]
==Checklists==
Passwords are hashed and salted for storage: * [[d74fe6bf-387f-4ff1-9edb-d0275eedffc0|Passwords Are Hashed And Salted]] * [[40bd25d2-b702-48b7-9102-bbbe674d6179|Passwords Are Hashed And Salted for Storage]] * [[9031f577-80b0-4a2e-9652-7b470439a0df|Access to the Credential Store Is Limited]]
==Additional Resources==
* For the CWE page about this vulnerability type, see http://cwe.mitre.org/data/definitions/522.html
